name: Free Vibrant Backgrounds
description:
A free pack of abstract gradient backgrounds that you can use to instantly add a touch of quality to your social media projects, product presentations, websites, apps and more!


The pack contains 20 ready-to-use premade gradients in 4K resolution, with a wide selection of color variations with trendy and vibrant colors.


This freebie includes a license for personal use, but you can get our premium packages for unrestricted use in any commercial project.


Highlights


  • 20 abstract gradient backgrounds 
  • Up to 4K Ultra HD (4127x4127px)
  • Super High-Quality Files
  • Beautiful color palette
  • Figma and PNG files
  • Personal License


Get a collection of +1000 vector shapes with gradient and color elements, easy to edit and adapt to all your creative projects.


Get full access to over 100,000 premium elements, illustrations, icons, vector shapes and images.
